RecipeDef.label: break the rock
RecipeDef.description: Break up the rock to get sand and slag. Each rock produces a different amount of these materials.

RecipeDef.label: Process slag
RecipeDef.description: Process slag. Side materials can be obtained with some chance.

RecipeDef.label: Process clay
RecipeDef.description: Process clay. Side materials can be obtained with some chance.

RecipeDef.label: Process sand
RecipeDef.description: Process sand. Side materials can be obtained with some chance.

RecipeDef.label: Process dirt
RecipeDef.description: Process dirt. Side materials can be obtained with some chance.
